thread.title: BRIEF-Sinclair Provides Additional Information About Agreements To Sell TV Stations Related To Closing Tribune Media Acquisition

title: BRIEF-Sinclair Provides Additional Information About Agreements To Sell TV Stations Related To Closing Tribune Media Acquisition
text:
May 9, 2018 / 11:21 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Sinclair Provides Additional Information About Agreements To Sell TV Stations Related To Closing Tribune Media Acquisition Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 9 (Reuters) - Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc:
* SINCLAIR PROVIDES ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ABOUT AGREEMENTS TO SELL TV STATIONS RELATED TO CLOSING TRIBUNE MEDIA ACQUISITION
* SINCLAIR PROVIDES ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ABOUT AGREEMENTS TO SELL TV STATIONS RELATED TO CLOSING TRIBUNE MEDIA ACQUISITION
* SINCLAIR BROADCAST GROUP INC - REACHES AGREEMENT FOR MULTI-YEAR RENEWALS OF 34 FOX AFFILIATIONS
* SINCLAIR BROADCAST - EXCLUDING STATIONS WHERE CO TO CONTINUE TO SERVICES AFTER DISPOSITIONS, DIVESTED STATIONS ARE BEING SOLD FOR $1.5 BILLION
* SINCLAIR BROADCAST- FOX BROADCASTING IS BUYER OF SOME TV STATIONS THAT TRIBUNE, CO EXPECT TO SELL FOR CLOSE OF CO’S ACQUISITION OF TRIBUNE STOCK
* SINCLAIR - INCLUDING TRIBUNE DEAL, AND PRO FORMA FOR EXPECTED SYNERGIES, CO’S 2017, 2018 FREE CASH FLOW EXPECTED TO BE $1.550 BILLION TO $1.575 BILLION
* SINCLAIR BROADCAST - FOX AGREED TO PROVIDE CO WITH OPTION TO PURCHASE TELEVISION STATIONS WPWR-TV, KTBC-TV
